sections.content: Also known as Odin (√ì√∞inn). Associated with Allfather, Valfather, Grimnir (Masked One). Known by the epithets: Allfather.
sections.title: Description

items:
Children: thor (with jord), baldr, hod (with frigg), vidar (with grid), vali, hermod, many others
siblings: vili, tyr (war companion), heimdall (watchman), giants in general, loki are blood-brothers by oath, despite loki being a giant's son

items:
Children: modi ("courage"), magni ("strength") with j√°rnsaxa, thrud ("power") with sif, ullr (stepson, hod (half-brother), vidar (half-brother), occasionally loki (their relationship is complex), especially jormung, giant sorcerers, the forces of chaos

thor, honesty while loki embodies cunning, deception
